➤ Jan 2021 - Jun 2021

SEAE quotation

SEAE quotation is a CRM app that support for users to create quotation, management products,... Then export file excel or csv for client to reference price. In this project, we custom or create new module that base on requirement of customer. Responsibilities:

● Develop UI website.

● Override model and create new.

● Improve performance.

● Create new module.

Technologies used in project:

● HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

● XML RPC in odoo.

● XML.

● Git.

● Odoo.

Achievements:

● Experience in custom xml file, working with xml rpc.

● Learn new technical skills such as odoo.

● Experience in estimate tasks that don't depend on technical.

● Ability in teamwork.
